price: Ta l’ó sì ṣìnà ju ẹni tí ó ń pè lẹ́yìn Allāhu, ẹni tí kò lè jẹ́ ìpè rẹ̀ títí di Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde! Àti pé wọn kò ní òye sí pípè tí wọ́n ń pè wọ́n.¹
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَن لَّا يَسۡتَجِيبُ لَهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَهُمۡ عَن دُعَآئِهِمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: 1. Àpẹ̀ẹrẹ àwọn olùṣìnà jùlọ yìí ni àwọn nasọ̄rọ̄ tí wọ́n ń pe Ànábì ‘Īsā ọmọ Mọryam - kí ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - pẹ̀lú àwáwí pé ó wà láàyè nínú sánmọ̀, àmọ́ tí wọn kò mọ̀ pé ó kàn wà nínú sánmọ̀ ni, kò lè gbọ́ ìpè wọn áḿbọ̀sìbọ́sí pé ó máa jẹ́pè wọn. Allāhu nìkan ṣoṣo l’Ó lè jẹ́pè àwọn ẹrúsìn rẹ̀, onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman aḍallu mimman yadʿū min dūni al-lahi man lā yastajību lahu ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati wahum ʿan duʿāihim ghāfilūna
